name: Daily atmosphere  carbon dioxide concentration
description: This API provides on a quasi-daily basis, the amount of carbon dioxide (CO2) in the atmosphere from 2010.01.01 to the present. It is expressed as a mole fraction in dry air, parts per million (ppm).

api_methods.name: Carbon dioxide endpoint
api_methods.description: The response will be an object with no CORS resources enabled.

utterances.utterance: What is the current carbon dioxide concentration in the atmosphere?
Can you tell me the latest CO2 levels in the air?
How much carbon dioxide is in the atmosphere today?
What are the recent CO2 levels in the atmosphere?
Could you provide the current atmospheric CO2 concentration?
What is the mole fraction of CO2 in dry air right now?
Can you give me the latest atmospheric carbon dioxide data?
What is the current ppm of CO2 in the atmosphere?
How has the CO2 concentration in the atmosphere changed recently?
What is the atmospheric CO2 level expressed in parts per million?
